GR13kubjt_au:4720: kṣa krodhāvali a ananta ajara bhairava ha haṃsāvali ā mahānanda āpakumbha bhairava sa ānandāvali i pracaṇḍa iḍācāra bhairava ṣa garbhāvali ī ḍāmara indramūrti bhairava śa saṃhārāvali u udyāna ulkāsya bhairava va amṛtāvali ū vasanta ūṣmāda bhairava la vipulāvali ṛ ṛpudarpa ṛpusūdana bhairava ra kālāntakāvali ṝ kṛtānta ṝmukta bhairava ya pracaṇḍāvali ḷ prasanna ḷptakāya bhairava ma mahāmohāvali ḹ mahāmāyā ḹpāda bhairava bha bhūtabhayāvali e raudra ekadaṃṣṭra bhairava ba vaḍavāmukhāvali ai mahādaṃṣṭra airāvata bhairava pha lampaṭāvali o kaṅkāla oghāmbu bhairava pa pavanāvali au anaṅga auṣadhīghna bhairava na kusumāvali aṃ svacchanda aṃjana bhairava dha vipulāvali aḥ manmatha aḥhvakāyabhairava da suratāvali ka unmatta kambala bhairava tha kūrmāvali kha meghanāda kharuṣānana bhairava ta tvaritāvali ga karāla gomukha bhairava ṇa mandarāvali gha vikarāla ghaṇṭāla bhairava ḍha khaṭvāṅgāvali ṅa mahābala ṅaṇanāntabhairava ḍa candrāvali ca asitāṅga caṇḍadhāra bhairava
GR13kubjt_au:4721: ṭha vajrāvali cha ulka chaṭāṭopa bhairava ṭa manthāvali ja ekapāda jaṭālākṣa bhairava ña kāntāvali jha kapāla jhaṅkīśa bhairava jha ambikāvali ña vyoma ñabhaṭeśvara bhairava ja bhedakāvali ṭa vetāla ṭaṅkapāṇi bhairava cha kṛtāntāvali ṭha āmardaka ṭhānubandha bhairava ca caturbhujāvali ḍa mahāsāha ḍāmara bhairava ṅa yogāvali ḍha ruru ḍhaḍhṛkarṇa bhairava gha bhūtāvali ṇa bhuvana ṇatīkānta bhairava ga abhayāvali ta vibhūti taḍidbhāsvara bhairava kha carcakāvali tha ūrdhvasepha thavira bhairava ka bhasmāntakāvali da krūra dantura bhairava aḥ sṛṣṭikāvali dha lohita dhanada bhairava aṃ vijayāvali na lampaṭa nāgakarṇa bhairava au brahmāvali pa carcaka pracaṇḍa bhairava o sadyojātāvali pha ....... phetkāra bhairava ai phetkārāvali ba acintya vīrasiṃha bhairava
GR13kubjt_au:4722: e karṇamoṭāvali bha mahādevāṅga bhṛkuṭi bhairava ḹ mahāmohāvali ma mahākālāgni meghabhāsura bhairava ḷ mahāmāyāvali ya mārtaṇḍa yugānta bhairava ṝ gāndhārāvali ra prāṇa raurava bhairava ṛ puṣpāvali la ananta lamboṣṭha bhairava ū śabdāvali va ucchuṣma vasala bhairava u mahāghoṣāvali śa mahāyaśa śukatuṇḍa bhairava ī sūkṣmāvali ṣa mahodyāna ṣaṭālākṣa bhairava vidyāvali sa amṛta sunāsa bhairava ā vyāpakāvali ha śubhaṅkara hūhūka bhairava a mahāmāyāvali kṣa pralayāntaka kṣayānta bhairava || KubjT_22.8 ||

GR13kubjt_au:5986: mano'nugā ca sukṛtā $ saumyā caiva nirañjanā &

GR13kubjt_au:5988: helā lolā tathā līlā $ bodhābodhavatīti ca &
GR13kubjt_au:5991: ghoṣaṇī ghoṣamārgasthā % śikhā dhūmrā ca piṅgalā // KubjT_25.175 //
GR13kubjt_au:5995: kaṃsadhvanis tathā saumyā % ghaṇṭā caiva nirañjanā // KubjT_25.177 //
GR13kubjt_au:5996: haṃsākhyā tu nirālambā $ kiṅkiṇī tu mahābalā &
GR13kubjt_au:5998: ghoṣamārge tu yo haṃso $ helā nāmeti cocyate &
GR13kubjt_au:5999: tasya madhye tu yaḥ śabdo % lolākhyā sā prakīrtitā // KubjT_25.179 //
GR13kubjt_au:6001: cītkṛtaṃ karṇadeśe tu % bodhābodhavatī tu sā // KubjT_25.180 //
GR13kubjt_au:6002: ātmānaṃ haṃsam ity āhur $ māyārūpā tu bodhanī &
GR13kubjt_au:6003: kuṇḍalī tu samākhyātā % rudraśaktis tu bindukam // KubjT_25.181 //
GR13kubjt_au:6004: gagane dṛśyate yas tu $ prabhākāreṇa suprabhaḥ &
GR13kubjt_au:6007: etāvasthāḥ samākhyātā % udayanti krameṇa tu // KubjT_25.183 //
GR13kubjt_au:6009: tasya siddhir bhavaty āśu % nānyathā kubjike vacaḥ // KubjT_25.184 //
GR13kubjt_au:6010: pitu[ḥ] prāptaṃ yathā saukhyaṃ $ tat sukhaṃ bhuñjate svayam &
GR13kubjt_au:6011: mṛtyur yena sukheneha % tat sukhaṃ dhyānam ucyate // KubjT_25.185 //
GR13kubjt_au:6012: śrībhairava uvāca samastedaṃ varārohe $ durlabhaṃ prakaṭīkṛtam &
GR13kubjt_au:6013: tvaṃ punaś cāvatāritvā % kramaughaṃ samprakāśaya // KubjT_25.186 //
GR13kubjt_au:6014: sugopyaṃ gopanībhūtvā $ kramaṃ pūjyārihā bhava // KubjT_25.187 //
GR13kubjt_au:6015: yā sā kubji parā mahaughajananī sañcodito 'haṃ tvayā $ tvaṃ kubjā parakubjinī mama punas tvāhaṃ mayā tvaṃ punaḥ &
GR13kubjt_au:6016: tvayādiṣṭacatuṣṭayaṃ kramapathaṃ teṣāṃ kramo vai yathā % sampreṣyātmagataṃ kramaughaparamaṃ cājñā gṛhītānaghe // KubjT_25.188 //
GR13kubjt_au:6018: asya bhedopabhedāś ca % bhaviṣyanti hy anekadhā // KubjT_25.189 //
GR13kubjt_au:6020: caturviṃśatisāhasraṃ % kiṃ tu tat prakaṭaṃ na hi // KubjT_25.190 //
GR13kubjt_au:6021: kartavyaṃ tu tvayā bhadre $ kiṃ tu pīṭhacatuṣṭaye &
GR13kubjt_au:6022: prakāśayasva cājñāto % yathā gopyataraṃ bhavet // KubjT_25.191 //
GR13kubjt_au:6024: yatra vā tiṣṭhate deśe % sa deśo bhuktibhāg bhavet // KubjT_25.192 //
GR13kubjt_au:6026: tiṣṭhate yasya 'sau nāthe % puraṃ pīṭhasamaṃ bhavet // KubjT_25.193 //
GR13kubjt_au:6027: gṛhaṃ tad yogapīṭhaṃ ca $ mantavyam anvayānvitaiḥ &
GR13kubjt_au:6028: āgamaṃ maṇḍalādyais tu % pūjyoghaṃ pārameśvaram // KubjT_25.194 //
GR13kubjt_au:6030: divyais tu pūjyate so hi % yadi gopyataraṃ bhavet // KubjT_25.195 //
GR13kubjt_au:6032: pūjayet paramāmnāyaṃ % pūjyate sa marīcibhiḥ // KubjT_25.196 //
GR13kubjt_au:6033: yas tv evaṃ vindate devi $ granthataś cārthato 'pi vā &
GR13kubjt_au:6034: sa jyeṣṭhaḥ kulasantāne % pūjyo 'sau bhairavo yathā // KubjT_25.197 //
GR13kubjt_au:6035: avajñāṃ kurute yas tu $ yasya tasya prakāśayet &
GR13kubjt_au:6036: sāmarthyena satāṃ dviṣṭo % bhraṣṭo duḥkhī sa sarvataḥ // KubjT_25.198 //
GR13kubjt_au:6038: namaskāreṇa tat pīṭhaṃ % tasyaivāyaṃ puroditam // KubjT_25.199 //
GR13kubjt_au:6039: śrutvaivaṃ vismayāpannā $ ūcus tv evaṃ kuleśvarī &
GR13kubjt_au:6045: prathamaṃ madguṇair bhadre $ dvitīyaṃ ca khagāntare &
GR13kubjt_au:6048: bhaviṣyasi purāvasthā % hrāsyamānā pade pade // KubjT_25.204 //
GR13kubjt_au:6050: teṣu tyajya parāmnāyaṃ % bhūtāveśakarī bhava // KubjT_25.205 //
GR13kubjt_au:6052: tadā kāle tu taṃ hatvā % samāpyevaṃ punar bhaja // KubjT_25.206 //
GR13kubjt_au:6054: asyoccāraṃ na kartavyam % uccārād ay utaṃ japet // KubjT_25.207 //
GR13kubjt_au:6055: kubjikā yā varārohe $ pañcabhiḥ praṇavaiḥ saha &
GR13kubjt_au:6056: tair vinā na hi coccāraṃ % kubjāmnāyamahādhvare // KubjT_25.208 //
GR13kubjt_au:6057: yais tu tāni varārohe $ kathayāmi svarūpataḥ &
GR13kubjt_au:6059: ādimaṃ ca tṛtīyaṃ ca $ daśamaṃ caikaviṃśakam &
GR13kubjt_au:6060: dvitīyaṃ caikaviṃśena % varjitaṃ pañcamaṃ tu tat // KubjT_25.210 //
GR13kubjt_au:6061: kiṃ tu vāmena jaṅghāyā $ hataṃ bījena kārayet &
GR13kubjt_au:6062: tad bījaṃ param uddiṣṭaṃ % sarvajñānāvatārakam // KubjT_25.211 //
GR13kubjt_au:6063: ambikā bindunādaṃ ca $ kuṇḍalī ca paraḥ śivaḥ &
GR13kubjt_au:6064: ratnānāṃ pañcakaṃ devi % vyāpayitvā sudurlabham // KubjT_25.212 //
GR13kubjt_au:6067: khecarā bhūcarā caiva $ dikcarā gocarā tathā &
GR13kubjt_au:6068: dadanti melakaṃ sarvaṃ % yasyedaṃ hṛdi saṃsthitam // KubjT_25.214 //
GR13kubjt_au:6069: devadevena devyāyā $ mataṃ divyaṃ mayā tava &
GR13kubjt_au:6070: kartavyaṃ tu tathā gopyam % ity ājñā pārameśvarī // KubjT_25.215 //
GR13kubjt_au:6072: śuklapakṣe tṛtīyāyāṃ % vaiśākhasya tathā punaḥ // KubjT_25.216 //
GR13kubjt_au:6074: āśvine śuklapakṣasya % pūrṇimā phālgune matā // KubjT_25.217 //
GR13kubjt_au:6075: āṣāḍhe śrāvaṇe caiva $ bhādrapadyāṃ tathaiva ca &
GR13kubjt_au:6076: śuklapakṣe caturdaśyāṃ % kartavyaṃ ca pavitrakam // KubjT_25.218 //
GR13kubjt_au:6078: guruparvam iti khyātaṃ % pālanīyaṃ kulāmbike // KubjT_25.219 //
GR13kubjt_au:6080: pīṭhamārgakramāyātam % āgamo 'yaṃ tad eva hi // KubjT_25.220 //
GR13kubjt_au:6082: yenedaṃ pustakaṃ devyāḥ % pūrvoktaṃ yan mayā tava // KubjT_25.221 //
GR13kubjt_au:6085: kusumaṃ ca rajaṃ raktaṃ $ rathyaṃ śivakusumbhakam &
GR13kubjt_au:6087: kādambarī prasannā ca $ parisruṅ madirā surā &
GR13kubjt_au:6088: vāmāmṛtam aliś caiva % somapānaṃ madālasī // KubjT_25.224 //
GR13kubjt_au:6090: varco brahmā dvijanmā ca % sarojaḥ kamalāsanaḥ // KubjT_25.225 //
GR13kubjt_au:6092: kuṇḍagolodbhavaṃ śukraṃ % śaśiś caiva sitaṃ madhu // KubjT_25.226 //
GR13kubjt_au:6093: kaṭaṃ māṃsaṃ palaṃ kravyaṃ $ piṣitaṃ phalguṣāmiṣam &
GR13kubjt_au:6094: jāṅgalaṃ devadāruṃ ca % kṣmā vai khaḍgodbhavaṃ smṛtam // KubjT_25.227 //
GR13kubjt_au:6095: tailaṃ vasā tathā snehaṃ $ kaṭutailaṃ tu tīkṣṇakam &
GR13kubjt_au:6097: laśunaṃ nāsikāvasthaṃ $ tac ca hiṅgu prakīrtitam &
GR13kubjt_au:6098: gajaṃ caiva tu kuṣmāṇḍaṃ % palāṇḍuṃ ca viśeṣataḥ // KubjT_25.229 //
GR13kubjt_au:6100: kṛṣṇacchāgo mahānetrī % palalaṃ meṣātmakaṃ smṛtam // KubjT_25.230 //
GR13kubjt_au:6103: nānena rahitā siddhir $ bhuktimuktir na vidyate &
GR13kubjt_au:6104: nirācārapadaṃ hy etat % tenedaṃ paramaṃ smṛtam // KubjT_25.232 //
GR13kubjt_au:6105: iti kulālikāmnāye śrīkubjikāmate samastajñānāvabodhacaryānirdeśo nāma pañcaviṃśatimaḥ paṭalaḥ
GR13kubjt_au:6106: iti caturviṃśatisāhasre sārāt sārataraṃ śrīkubjikāmnāyaṃ śrīoḍiyānapīṭhavinirgataṃ pañcaviṃśatipaṭalaṃ sārdhatrīṇi sahasrāṇi śrīmataṃ parisamāptam
